channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [added] TradeScreen (trademo-technologies-inc-finscreener)
item.description: Trademo TradeScreen is an AI-based real-time trade transaction validation tool powered by Knowledge graph of over 10 billion+data

item.title: [updated] watsonx Orchestrate (watsonx-orchestrate) has changed the description of the plan named essentials
item.description: *before*: Essentials Plan for customers to get started quickly building AI Assistants on IBM watsonx Orchestrate., *after*: Essentials Plan for customers to get started quickly building AI Agents and AI Assistants on IBM watsonx Orchestrate. To access previous skills-based experience for your business, please follow the steps outlined [here](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/watsonx/watson-orchestrate/current?topic=experience-switching-from-agentic-skills).

item.title: [updated] watsonx Orchestrate (watsonx-orchestrate) has a new plan named lite
item.description: 30-day free access to the Standard plan

item.title: [updated] watsonx Orchestrate (watsonx-orchestrate) has changed the description of the plan named standard
item.description:
*before*: Standard Plan for customers to streamline enterprise processes with expanded automation capabilities. Includes all capabilities from the Essentials Plan., *after*: Standard Plan for customers to streamline enterprise processes with Agentic AI capabilities. Includes all capabilities from the Essentials Plan.
To access previous skills-based experience for your business, please follow the steps outlined [here](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/watsonx/watson-orchestrate/current?topic=experience-switching-from-agentic-skills).

item.title: [added] NeuralSeek Professional Services (neuralseekservices)
item.description: NeuralSeek onboarding, training, and implementation services

item.title: [added] TechD Professional Services (techdservices)
item.description: TechD consulting, onboarding, implementation, training, and managed services for IBM Data & AI products

item.title: [updated] watsonx Orchestrate (watsonx-orchestrate) has removed the plan named lite
